short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better experience for McGraw Hill SmartBooks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smarterbook adds features to the McGraw Hill SmartBook online program that makes finishing chapters faster.  It adds buttons to quickly search and copy questions as well as a Control+Enter shortcut for submitting answers.

Note: This extension has been discontinued and is not functional.
